argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mpladd.p | |- P = ( I mPoly R ) |
| 2 |  | mpladd.b | |- B = ( Base ` P ) |
| 3 |  | mpladd.a | |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | mpladd.g | |- .+b = ( +g ` P ) |
| 5 |  | mpladd.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 6 |  | mpladd.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( I mPwSer R ) = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) = ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` P ) e. _V |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 11 | 1, 7, 2 | #P_mplval2 | |- P = ( ( I mPwSer R ) |`s B ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) = ( +g ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_ressplusg | |- ( B e. _V -> ( +g ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) = ( +g ` P ) ) |
| 14 | 10, 13 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( +g ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) = ( +g ` P ) |
| 15 | 4, 14 | #P_eqtr4i | |- .+b = ( +g ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 7, 2, 8 | #P_mplbasss | |- B C_ ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) |
| 17 | 16, 5 | #P_sseldi | |- ( ph -> X e. ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) ) |
| 18 | 16, 6 | #P_sseldi | |- ( ph -> Y e. ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) ) |
| 19 | 7, 8, 3, 15, 17, 18 | #P_psradd | |- ( ph -> ( X .+b Y ) = ( X oF .+ Y ) ) |
